topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551788626368720c76b70b00#post_551788626368720c76b70b00
Walk into big empty chamber with nothing but a closed door on the opposite side of entrance, and what appears to be a big offering container in the middle
Random moving void thingy occasionally moves across the door
I've seen one of these before in a random graveyard, and kept my distance then
I walk over to the door and let the void touch me this time
When it touches me I'm suddenly lifted into the air, and a giant hand is holding me
There is a giant creature in the room, attached to the ceiling, and it does "something" to me, takes away most of life, drops me, and the fall damage kills me

This thing was bigger than anything in this game, it's arms and hands were like tree roots, but I never saw it's head

I went back to get my stuff I lost, and the thing is gone, but the void thing is still appearing in front of the door
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body: I'm going off now. We're going to do the thing.
